Question: Other authors also attribute similar connotations to this person.
Hints: This person performed in 12-12-12: The Concert for Sandy Relief with the Rolling Stones on December 12, 2012.
This person and Richards moved into a flat in Edith Grove in Chelsea with a guitarist they had encountered named Brian Jones.
In the late 1970s, this person was cast as Wilbur, a main character in Werner Herzog's Fitzcarraldo.
